title: 'It's frustrating' - Smith out for 60 after poor shot

title: McCullum admits he's made mistakes after Ashes defeat
description: Brendon McCullum says his side haven't lived up to "high hopes and expectations" after failing to regain The Ashes, but that fans can expect his side to "show what we're capable of achieving" in the final two Test matches in the series.

title: Can Aston Villa sustain a title challenge?
description: Football Focus's Alex Scott, Nedum Onuoha and Glenn Murray look at Aston Villa's incredible Premier League form and whether they can sustain a title challenge this season.

title: 'Bazball as we knew it is in the skip - but McCullum has England future'
description: England must enact change following their Ashes defeat but Brendon McCullum's reaction suggests he can be part of the future, writes Jonathan Agnew.

title: 10 moments that decided the Ashes
description: Australia have regained the Ashes after winning the first three Tests against England down under once again - here are the 10 moments that decided the destination of the urn.

title: Booze, beach, beaten - how England lost the Ashes
description: BBC Sport chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt reveals the inside story of England's Ashes defeat in Australia on and off the pitch.

title: All the Sports Personality 2025 winners
description: All the award winners at BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2025, as Rory McIlroy claims the top prize.

title: Remembering the sports stars we lost in 2025
description: A host of figures from the world of sport died in 2025 - BBC Sport remembers some of those sporting names.

title: I've realised I can make a difference - Hoy
description: In a new BBC documentary, Sir Chris Hoy shows how he is using his Olympic mindset to reframe his purpose following a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: Victoria Wood serves up a large helping of Christmas comedy
description: Victoria Wood serves up a large helping of Christmas comedy with a series of pastiches.

title: Julian Clary hosts a yuletide celebration like no other...
description: Julian Clary hosts a brand new panel show celebrating everything he hates about Christmas.

title: The man behind the headlines - Salah, by Klopp, Diaz and more
description: BBC Sport explores Mohamed Salah's personality with help from the people who know him best.

title: Inside McLaren's season - the rules, values, incidents & relationships
description: Intra-team title battles turn toxic far more often than not. Andrew Benson analyses how McLaren have maintained relative harmony between Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri.

title: England's AI World Cup masterplan - from perfecting penalties to powering players
description: BBC Sport hears from inside the England setup about how artificial intelligence is powering plans for next summer's World Cup.

title: 'Raise hell' - the fastest bowler you might not have heard of
description: The story of Duncan Spencer, the "frighteningly fast" bowler who could have played for England or Australia.

title: What next for friendly foes who see each other 'more than family'?
description: Jannik Sinner and Carlos Alcaraz have dominated menâ€™s tennis in 2025. BBC Sport looks at the evolution of their growing rivalry â€“ and where it could go next.
